original_text: “Six days do your work, but on the seventh day do not work, so that your ox and your donkey may rest, and so that the slave born in your household and the foreigner living among you may be refreshed.
korean_text: 너는 엿새 동안에 네 일을 하고 일곱째 날에는 쉬라 네 소와 나귀가 쉴 것이며 네 여종의 자식과 나그네가 숨을 돌리리라

sentences.original_text: but on the seventh day do not work
so that your ox and your donkey may rest
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 네 소와 네 나귀가 쉴 수 있게 하라

sentences.original_text: and so that the slave born in your household
and the foreigner living among you may be refreshed
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 거류하는 이방인이 숨을 돌리게 하라
